author: kn:ez.no
msg: - Use PHPUnits XML diffing to compare SVG files
# Only works with PHPUnit >= 3.1.2 or PHPUnit 3.1.1 including changesets

author: as:ez.no
msg: - Fixed the broken OpenID test by setting the association validity to one week
from the current date.

author: as:ez.no
msg: - Implemented feature request #11061: Added missing conditions for SMTP
methods.
- Added check for file existance before deletion in ShutdownHandler.
- Added static variables in the tests to keep server name, port, etc, in order
to make it easier to migrate to other test servers.
- Added mock object tests for IMAP, POP3 and SMTP.
- Exposed some methods and variables as protected (for mock object tests).
- Reorganized the options tests for IMAP, POP3 and SMTP.

author: sb:ez.no
msg: - PHPUnit 3.1 Migration
- Migrate PHPUnit_Framework_Assert::getAttribute() to
PHPUnit_Framework_Assert::readAttribute().
- Use PHPUnit_Framework_TestCase::setLocale().
- Populate code coverage whitelist from autoload arrays.
- Remove ezcTestRunner::addFileToFilter().
# PHPUnit 3.1 is now required.

author: dr:ez.no
msg: - Added 2007.1 release file.
